title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 3164/82 of 22 November 1982 amending Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 on common measures to improve the conditions under which agricultural products are processed and marketeda
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 3164/82
of 22 November 1982
amending Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 on common measures to improve the conditions under which agricultural products are processed and marketed
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 is hereby amended as follows:
1. The last subparagraph of Article 16 (2) shall be replaced by the following:
'The estimated cost for 1983 and 1984 respectively shall be 156 million ECU.'
2. Article 17a (1) shall be replaced by the following:
'1. By way of derogation from Article 17 (2):
(a) the financial contribution of the recipient must be at least:
- 25 % in the case of projects carried out in the Mezzogiorno and in all areas of the Hellenic Republic, with the exception of Greater Athens,
- 35 % in the case of projects carried out in Languedoc-Roussillon and projects concerning wine carried out in the departments of Vaucluse, Bouches-du-Rhône, Var, Ardèche and Drôme;
(b) the aid granted by the Fund shall not exceed:
- 50 % for projects carried out in the Mezzogiorno and in all areas of the Hellenic Republic, with the exception of Greater Athens,
- 35 % for projects carried out in Languedoc-Roussillon and projects concerning wine carried out in the departments of Vaucluse, Bouches-du-Rhône, Var, Ardèche and Drôme.'

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 November 1982.
For the Council
The President
U. ELLEMANN-JENSEN
